lobby.name: Lobby
lobby.intro: You hear a fireplace crackling as your eyes slowly adjust to the shimmering light.

south.transition: You climb down the stairs into the wine cellar.

west.transition: Through the heavy curtains you enter a desolate theater.

south.transition: You enter the lobby with a distinct feeling of a deja vú.

west.transition: You enter the lobby with a distinct feeling of a deja vú.

wineCellar.name: Wine Cellar
wineCellar.intro: It reeks of the nobles drops that have since turned into vinegar.

north.transition: You enter the lobby with a distinct feeling of a deja vú.

theater.name: Theater
theater.intro: To the north are what used to be a stage and now resembles an impressive collection of holes in the floor.

east.transition: You enter the lobby with a distinct feeling of a deja vú.
You fall through a hole in the stagefloor and find yourself in the wine cellar.
